How to activate your license (manually)
1. Open Nitro PDF Professional
2. On the Help ribbon, in the Product group, click About(if you started in trialware mode) and then
3. Click Activate
4. Click Activate manually via a web browser
5. Copy of the installation ID
6. Run Keygen as Adminstrator
7. Enter Install ID
8. Click on Generate
9.Copy the newly generated activation certificate.
10. On the Activate Manually dialog, paste in the activation code to the Certificate Box and click Activate to complete the process.
Enjoy !!!
